title: Men's 5" Running Shorts 2 Pack Quick Dry Athletic Workout Gym Shorts with Zipper Pockets
description: A relaxed-fit workout gym shorts made from lightweight for a supple feel and ideal drape.The premium quality polyester fabric is stitched with double lock systems. The quick-dry, breathable fabric helps the ventilation to your skin during the workouts. Running workout shorts are tested to last long and stay in great condition all throughout. Our men's fitness athletic shorts offer a comfortable fit and perforated detail for breathability to keep you dry through intense workouts;

Athletic training shorts offer a relaxed fit with a rugged cut-off hem to cater to both style and performance. The dual-concealed zippered pockets hold your small essentials,whilst our premium elastic waistband with invisible drawcord provides a secure fit during high-paced activities.Our bodybuilding workout running shorts have a streamlined design and very unique cuts and details that will be suitable for the fitness sports;

The athletic fitness shorts will have a breathable elastic panel between the sides and inner seams,promoting ventilation as well as flexibility.A super lightweight, high-stretch elastic panel - complimented by breathable mesh fabric and low-profile seams - is technically engineered so you can train for flexibility and focus harder than ever before;

Gaglg gym workout shorts have been carefully chosen for their fit,their performance, and their durability. If you want gym bodybuilding shorts for men that can keep up with you, pace for pace,our fitness workout collection is easily up to the task.Suitable for Running,Workout,Training,Jogging,Basketball,Boxing Wear,Soccer,cycling,hiking and other training activities;
